snippet: An email written by the dean of students at the college, which is near Los Angeles, after a newspaper article about the treatment of students of color has led to her resignation.
abstract: Mary Spellman, dean of students at Claremont McKenna College, steps down in wake of student protests over college's treatment of minority students.
lead_paragraph: An email written by the dean of students at the college, which is near Los Angeles, after a newspaper article about the treatment of students of color has led to her resignation.

headline.main: Dean at Claremont McKenna College Resigns Amid Protests
headline.print_headline: Protests Lead to a Dean’s Resignation
